creator: vinod.pachpute@credentek.com
text: How to implement FOP with C++?

creator: med1985@gmail.com
text: How exactly is this a bug?

creator: vinod.pachpute@credentek.com
text:
Dear Mehdi,

I want to integrate this tool in c++.Please give any documentation/any information regarding with this.

This isn't a bug, if you wish for such information you can either use the fop-users mailing list:
<fop-users@xmlgraphics.apache.org>

or more appropriate for this question, you can ask on the fop-dev mailing list:

<fop-dev@xmlgraphics.apache.org>.

As for how to answer your question, I'd recommend you post on one of those and someone might be able to help. As far as I know, FOP doesn't have a C/C++ API, but you can use the shell API to invoke FOP from the command line in C++.
creator: med1985@gmail.com
vinod.pachpute@credentek.com
text:
Thanks,I got the solution.
But,It is not accept stylesheet file from command line argument.

Please give me solution for this.

creator: adelmelle@apache.org
text:
Similar to #51266. This is not a bug. For usage or development questions, please use the appropriate mailing lists.

Thanks!

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed for remaining resolved bugs
